ace-playbook-metadata.description: ACE system playbook metadata files tracking pattern insights and reflector analysis

multi-epoch-training.description: Training loop patterns for iterative pattern refinement with epoch-based statistics

ace-reflector-agent.description: Reflector agent system for analyzing pattern usage and generating meta-learning insights

meta-learning-documentation.description: Self-documenting systems that track and analyze their own pattern usage for continuous improvement

structured-metadata-pattern.description: YAML frontmatter combined with markdown content for machine-readable and human-readable documentation

incremental-training-architecture.description: Epoch-based training loops with statistical tracking for iterative pattern improvement

auto-generated-living-documentation.description: Documentation that automatically updates based on system behavior and usage patterns

evidence-based-learning.description: Systems that learn and improve based on actual usage evidence rather than theoretical assumptions

machine-human-readable-hybrid.description: Data structures that serve both machine processing and human comprehension needs

temporal-tracking.description: Tracking changes and evolution over time with timestamps and versioning

self-reflection-systems.description: Systems that analyze their own behavior and patterns to identify improvement opportunities

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
